dmca.title: Google DMCA culinart / sugarcraft
dmca.body:
1948 W. 8th St.
Cincinnati, OH 45204
800-333-5678
5 13-244-2999 513-244-2555 Fax
culinart@yahoo.com
www.culinart.net

Culinart, Inc.


October 26, 2006

Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043

I would like to notify you that the intellectual property and copyrighted mark of my corporation has been infringed upon and appears in your search results. The copyrighted work at issue is the product name, SILICONE PLASTIQUE that appears on our website at: http://www.culinart.net/silicone.html.

Please note that on our web page we have properly identified SILICONE PLASTIQUE as a trade mark with the TM symbol and also give notice at the bottom of the page indicating the following:
Copyright 1996-2006 Culinart, Inc. All Rights Reserved
Silicone Plastique is a trademark of Culinart, Inc.

The material that is infringing my company's mark appears in the Google web search results when the name SILICONE PLASTIQUE is used as the search query.

Search Query: Silicone Plastique

Infringing Web Pages: www.sugarcraft.com/catalog/gumpaste/plastique/plastique. 
www.sugarcraft.com/catalog/gumpaste/plastique.htm

Please note that the name SILICONE PLASTIQUE is used only in the title tag and not as anlame for the product that is actually being sold on the web page. This is an obvious attempt to bait and switch Google users, misleading them into purchasing a product that is not what
they searched for.

My contact information: Mr. Dominic Palazzolo
President
Culinart, Inc. - address, phone & fax on letterhead
Email: dominic@culinart.net
 
Contact information for owner/administrator of infringing web page:

Sugarcraft. Inc.
Dolores McCann, President
2715 Dixie Highway (Rt. 4)
Hamilton, Ohio 45015
PH: 513-896-7089
FAX: 513-863-4934
EMAIL: proicer@sugarcraft.com

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in this notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Before sending this notification to you, I have:

1. Reviewed the entire situation with my attorney who will receive copies of this letter:
Ms. Kathryn Evans Smith
Wood. Herron & Evans. L.L.P.
email: ksmith@whepatent.com
(513) 241-2324

2. Made a request in good faith to the infringer to stop using my corporation's mark via Certified mail. Letter was refused and returned unopened. Please refer to enclosed copy.

I would like to acknowledge that your department must be very busy with these types of actions yet at the same time would appreciate your prompt attention if at all possible.
 
Thank you,
Dominic Palazzolo
President
Culinart, Inc.
